Some people clung to tree branches for several hours to avoid being washed away by the floodwaters.	有些人緊緊抓住樹枝幾個小時，以免被洪水沖走
The handyman was supposed to arrive at twelve noon, but got stuck in a traffic jam for a few hours.	勤雜工原定中午十二點到達，但塞車了幾個小時
My parents usually speak to each other in French, even though my mother is a native English speaker.	儘管我母親的母語是英語，但我的父母通常用法語交談
The large crowd roared in approval as Mark Knopfler played the first few bars of "Money for Nothing".	當馬克諾夫勒 (Mark Knopfler) 演奏《Money for Nothing》的前幾小節時，一大群人發出了熱烈的歡呼
If you'd listen a little more carefully to what the teacher says, you'd probably be able to understand.	如果你仔細聽老師講的話，你可能就能理解
Tom's daughter pretended not to know him when he came to pick her up from school in his battered old car.	當湯姆開著那輛破舊的汽車來接她放學時，他的女兒假裝不認識他
Many conservationists fear the continuing slaughter of whales is pushing these animals towards extinction.	許多自然資源保護主義者擔心，持續的鯨魚屠殺正在將這些動物推向滅絕
Last year in the Philippines, earthquakes and tidal waves resulted in the deaths of more than 6,000 people.	去年菲律賓地震和海嘯導致6000多人死亡
Is that Tom calling again "Yes. He calls every evening these days. I shouldn't have given him my number."	湯姆又打來電話了嗎 “是的這些天他每天晚上都打電話來我不應該給他我的電話號碼”
My mother speaks French better than my father speaks English, so they usually speak to each other in French.	我母親的法語說得比我父親的英語好，所以他們通常用法語交談
Tom didn't know how to translate the word "computer" because the people he was talking to had never seen one.	湯姆不知道如何翻譯“計算機”這個詞，因為與他交談的人從未見過計算機
Tom doesn't like to use the term "a person of color" because he thinks it implies that white people have no color.	湯姆不喜歡使用「有色人種」這個詞，因為他認為這意味著白人沒有膚色
If you don't want to put on sunscreen, that's your problem. Just don't come complaining to me when you get a sunburn.	如果你不想塗防曬霜，那是你的問題只是當你曬傷時不要來向我抱怨
Even now, I occasionally think I'd like to see you. Not the you that you are today, but the you I remember from the past.	即使現在，我偶爾也會想見你不是今天的你，而是我記憶中的過去的你
It's very easy to sound natural in your own native language, and very easy to sound unnatural in your non-native language.	用自己的母語很容易聽起來很自然，而用非母語很容易聽起來不自然
I got fired from the company, but since I have a little money saved up, for the time being, I won't have trouble with living expenses.	我被公司開除了，但我還有點積蓄，暫時生活費不會有問題
If a person has not had a chance to acquire his target language by the time he's an adult, he's unlikely to be able to reach native speaker level in that language.	如果一個人在成年時沒有機會學習他的目標語言，他就不太可能達到該語言的母語程度
